## IConfigCompiler interface

Determines how the TypeScript compiler engine will be invoked by API Extractor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IConfigCompiler 
```

## Remarks

This is part of the [IConfigFile](./api-extractor.iconfigfile.md) structure.

_(Optional)_ Provides a compiler configuration that will be used instead of reading the tsconfig.json file from disk.
